attributes.action: Change MP Selection Procedures & accomodation support whilst in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clear the deck of MPs from all Parties who have been exposed by expenses scandle. Select new MPs by the Jurerer selection process and change the term of office to One year only. 

There to be No second home allowance.M Ps to be accomodated in Government run and expensed halls of residence near Westminster which each MP can use in London free on parliament business only. All accomodation to be exactly the same standard for every MP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
